name: Pong Classic - Mobile Arcade
description:
The Timeless Classic is back! Now with even more game modes and themes.

Pong Classic features 2 single player game modes and a two person game mode. Whether you want to have a quick game to kill some time, or want to challenge a friend for a match, this game is perfect for you.

Simply swipe left and right on your side of the screen to control the paddle.
